channel.title: Optimization on Seoyeong Park
channel.description: Recent content in Optimization on Seoyeong Park

item.title: Reinforcement learning model for multi-objective food allocation optimization system
item.description: Abstract Developing an RL-based user modeling framework for food agences to optimizae food allocation to end-users by capturing, shaping user needs and preferences, and nudging shifting tastes via persuasive messaging. Approaching as a multi-stakeholder recommendation system to consider benefits of both users and providers.
